Html:
I have followed a tutorial on how to add footer to the document, and it worked in FOP, but in FO.NET the document body overlaps the footer and I can't apply margin to the body to fix it.

This is the footer part I used:

<fo:static-content flow-name="xsl-region-after"><fo:table space-before="0.3in" table-layout="fixed" inline-progression-dimension.optimum="100%"><fo:table-column/><fo:table-column/><fo:table-column/><fo:table-body><fo:table-row><fo:table-cell><fo:block>
                                        {copyright-info}
                                    </fo:block></fo:table-cell><fo:table-cell><fo:block>{image-here}</fo:block></fo:table-cell><fo:table-cell><fo:block text-align="right"><fo:page-number/>/<fo:page-number-citation ref-id="last-page"/></fo:block></fo:table-cell></fo:table-row></fo:table-body></fo:table></fo:static-content>

Hi

I don't have a solution, but it is worth noting the FO.NET was based on FOP version 0.20.4.  Since that version FOP may have had many layout improvements which could explain why the tutorial does not work in FO.NET.

Mark
